verses.verse: So all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogies<s%>; and, behold, they were <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, who were carried <S%H1540>away<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> for their <S%H4604>transgression<s%>.

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> that dwelt in their <S%H272>possessions<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> were, the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>.

And in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>;

<S%H5793>Uthai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6557>Pharez<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And of the <S%H7888>Shilonites<s%>; <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>; <S%H3262>Jeuel<s%>, and their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; <S%H5543>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1938>Hodaviah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Hasenuah<s%>,

And <S%H2997>Ibneiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>, and <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4381>Michri<s%>, and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephathiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2998>Ibnijah<s%>;

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, according to their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%>. All these <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.
And of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>; <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, and <S%H3080>Jehoiarib<s%>, and <S%H3199>Jachin<s%>,

And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>;

And <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%>, and <S%H4640>Maasiai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3170>Jahzerah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4921>Meshillemith<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%>;

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%>; very <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. very: Heb. mighty men of valour

And of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>; <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hasshub<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>;

And <S%H1230>Bakbakkar<s%>, <S%H2792>Heresh<s%>, and <S%H1559>Galal<s%>, and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Micah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>;

And <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, and <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H2691>villages<s%> of the <S%H5200>Netophathites<s%>.

And the <S%H7778>porters<s%> were, <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, and <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, and <S%H2929>Talmon<s%>, and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, and their <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief<s%>;
Who hitherto waited in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>: they were <S%H7778>porters<s%> in the <S%H4264>companies<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6981>Kore<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, the <S%H7145>Korahites<s%>, were over the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%>, <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>gates<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>: and their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, being over the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, were <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H3996>entry<s%>. gates: Heb. thresholds
And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> was the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over them in time <S%H6440>past<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with him.
And <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> was <S%H7778>porter<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

All these which were <S%H1305>chosen<s%> to be <S%H7778>porters<s%> in the <S%H5592>gates<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%>. These were reckoned by their <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> in their <S%H2691>villages<s%>, <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> did <S%H3245>ordain<s%> in their set <S%H530>office<s%>. did: Heb. founded set: or, trust

So they and their <S%H1121>children<s%> had the oversight of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, namely, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, by <S%H4931>wards<s%>.
In <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>quarters<s%> were the <S%H7778>porters<s%>, toward the <S%H4217>east<s%>, <S%H3220>west<s%>, <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H5045>south<s%>.
And their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, which were in their <S%H2691>villages<s%>, were to <S%H935>come<s%> after <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> with them.

For these <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1368>chief<s%> <S%H7778>porters<s%>, were in their set <S%H530>office<s%>, and were over the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. set: or, trust chambers: or, storehouses

And they <S%H3885>lodged<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, because the <S%H4931>charge<s%> was upon them, and the <S%H4668>opening<s%> thereof every <S%H1242>morning<s%> pertained to them.

And certain of them had the charge <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H5656>ministering<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, that they should bring them <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H4557>tale<s%> <S%H4557><s%>. bring: Heb. bring them in by tale, and carry them out by tale

Some of them also were <S%H4487>appointed<s%> to oversee the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and the <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>, and the <S%H1314>spices<s%>. instruments: or, vessels
And some of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7543>made<s%> the <S%H4842>ointment<s%> of the <S%H1314>spices<s%>.

And <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, one of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, who was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahite<s%>, had the set <S%H530>office<s%> over the things that were <S%H4639>made<s%> in the <S%H2281>pans<s%>. set: or, trust in: or, on flat plates, or, slices

And other of their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>, were over the <S%H3899>shewbread<s%> <S%H4635><s%>, to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> it every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>. shewbread: Heb. bread of ordering

And these are the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, who remaining in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were <S%H6362>free<s%> <S%H6359><s%>: for they were employed in that <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>. they: Heb. upon them
These <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H7218>chief<s%> throughout their <S%H8435>generations<s%>; these <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And in <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H25><s%>, <S%H3273>Jehiel<s%>, whose <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maachah<s%>:
And his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%>, then <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, and <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H5369>Ner<s%>, and <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>,
And <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>, and <S%H283>Ahio<s%>, and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%>.
And <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8043>Shimeam<s%>. And they also <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, over against their <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7027>Kish<s%>; and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H4444>Malchishua<s%>, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and <S%H792>Eshbaal<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H4807>Meribbaal<s%>: and <S%H4810>Meribbaal<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%> were, <S%H6377>Pithon<s%>, and <S%H4429>Melech<s%>, and <S%H8475>Tahrea<s%>, and Ahaz.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3294>Jarah<s%>; and <S%H3294>Jarah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5964>Alemeth<s%>, and <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%>, and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>; and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4162>Moza<s%>;
And <S%H4162>Moza<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1150>Binea<s%>; and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H682>Azel<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are these, <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%>, <S%H1074>Bocheru<s%>, and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, and <S%H8187>Sheariah<s%>, and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and <S%H2605>Hanan<s%>: these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel<s%>.
